alert.note: Alert for Upper Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 12:59AM MST until January 18 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Upper Yampa River Basin. * WHEN...From 5 AM this morning to 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially in open areas. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
